جنایات ( ... ) دو قرن جنایت در افغانستان : جنایات نسل کشی ، قتل عام ، برده داری ، جنگ های داخلی ، جنایات جنگی و جنایات حاد علیه بشریت شریف خان پیلوت عضو ارشد حزب وطن و مبارز ضد استبداد لشکر 110000 کوچی عبدالرحمان تکثیر شده ، کوچی طالبان قرن 21 می باشند هدایت امین ارسلا جاسوس چند جانبه و پدر طالبان نکتایی پوش به کرسی ریاست جمهوری چشم دوخته است ! انتشار مشخصات 4785 قربانی ؛ جلاد اگسا اسدالله سروری از زندان آزاد شده است ! ارزگان خاص : تیرباران دو تن از مردم هزاره توسط گروه قومی طالبان افشای لست شهدای تا هنوز گمنام افغانستان توسط دادستانی عالی کشور شاهی هالند سلام بر شجاعی سرباز فداکاری که فاشیسم را خاکسترنشین کرده است هزاره ، صدا ، فرهنگ و تاریخ آنان در ادبیات جهان ؛ 115 شاعر از 66 کشور جهان برای مردم هزاره شعر آفریده اند ارزگان خاص : فرمانده ی ضد طالب هدف حمله ی طالبان ، قاچاقچیان مواد مخدر و حکومت کرزی سکوت فرهنگیان ، سیاستمداران ، مدافعین حقوق بشر و مبشرین وحدت و همبستگی مردم افغانستان دربرابر پیام عید فطر گلب الدین حکمتیار چه معنی دارد گلبدین حکمتیار ، هزاره ها را مستقیم به نسل کشی و کوچ اجباری تهدید کرد پیام اشغالگر افغان ملا عمر در سالگرد کشتار شمالی ؛ ریشخندی به ده ها هزار قربانی هزاره ، اوزبیک و تاجیک زندگی یکی از گروه های قومی که بیشترین آزار و اذیت را تجربه کرده است واژه كليدهاى يك گروهآموزش ، مکاتب و دانشگاهآيساف ، ناتو و نيروهای بين المللیاستخبارات ، جاسوس و جاسوسیاعتراض ، راهپیمایی و تظاهراتافغانستان در المپیک 2012 لندنافغانستان و کشورهای منطقه و جهانانتخابات در افغانستانبهداشت و سلامتتبعیض ، تبعیض نژادی ، مذهبی و جنسیتیتجزیه افغانستانتروريزم ، کوچی طالبان ، طالبان و القاعدهجوانانحقوق کودکان و زناندو قرن جنایت در افغانستان : جنایات نسل کشی ، قتل عام ، برده داری ، جنگ های داخلی ، جنایات جنگی و جنایات حاد علیه بشریتدين ، عقايد و باورهاسرشماریشهید آزادی عبدالخالق هزارهشورای ملی ، پارلمان ، مجلسطبیعت و محيط زيستعلم و دانش0 | 20 محفوظ و متعلق به سايت کابل پرس ( افغانستان پرس ) می باشد . guinea | reliefweb guinée : la multiplication des incidents retarde les résultats des législatives législatives en guinée : l & # 039 ; opposition gagne le scrutin uninominal ( résultats provisoires ) guinea législatives en guinée : l & # 039 ; opposition gagne le scrutin uninominal ( résultats provisoires ) conakry , 17 octobre 2013 ( afp ) - les partis d 'opposition en guinée ont remporté 20 des 38 sièges du scrutin uninominal des législatives du 28 septembre , a annoncé jeudi la commission électorale nationale indépendante ( céni ) .
les résultats complets pour les 76 députés restants , élus à la proportionnelle au plus fort reste , doivent en principe être communiqués par la céni vendredi , ce qui permettra de déterminer qui du pouvoir ou de l 'opposition détiendra la majorité dans le nouveau parlement .
idps in car increase by 57 per cent to 394,900 idps .
guinea guinée : la multiplication des incidents retarde les résultats des législatives conakry , 12 octobre 2013 ( afp ) - la multiplication d 'incidents provoqués par le parti au pouvoir en guinée , donné battu dans la plus grande circonscription du pays , continuait samedi de retarder la publication des résultats complets des élections législatives guinéennes deux semaines après le vote .
conakry , 10 octobre 2013 ( afp ) - douze jours après les législatives en guinée , le résultat était toujours attendu jeudi , suspendu à celui de matoto , quartier populaire de conakry et circonscription clé où l 'opposition dispose d 'une avance de 3.000 voix .
guinea législatives " irrégulières " en guinée : la communauté internationale hausse le ton conakry , 9 octobre 2013 ( afp ) - après dix jours d 'atermoiements , la communauté internationale a confirmé des " irrégularités " lors des législatives du 28 septembre en guinée , dont les résultats complets étaient toujours attendus mercredi , tout en incitant l 'opposition à recourir aux moyens légaux de contestation .
guinea guinée : le parti au pouvoir en tête , selon des résultats toujours partiels conakry , 6 octobre 2013 ( afp ) - le parti au pouvoir en guinée , le rpg , est en tête des élections législatives du 28 septembre , dont l 'opposition a exigé l 'annulation pour fraude , selon des résultats partiels provisoires portant sur 31 circonscriptions sur 38 rendus publics dimanche soir .
guinea guinée : la communauté internationale se mobilise pour éviter les violences conakry , 6 octobre 2013 ( afp ) - la communauté internationale tente d 'éviter une explosion de violence en guinée où l 'opposition crie à la " fraude " et réclame l 'annulation des législatives du 28 septembre , dont le pouvoir revendique la victoire sans attendre les résultats .
guinea législatives en guinée : l & # 039 ; opposition veut annuler le scrutin , le pouvoir revendique la victoire conakry , 4 octobre 2013 ( afp ) - l 'opposition en guinée a exigé vendredi l 'annulation des législatives du 28 septembre , accusant de fraude " massive " le pouvoir qui a pour sa part revendiqué la " majorité " au parlement .
ces prises de position avant même la publication des résultats complets du scrutin que la commission électorale nationale indépendante ( céni ) continue d 'égrener au compte-gouttes , font craindre des troubles graves dans le pays .
guinea législatives en guinée : l & # 039 ; opposition ne veut plus compter les voix , parle de " cinéma " conakry , 3 octobre 2013 ( afp ) - l 'opposition guinéenne a décidé jeudi de ne plus participer aux comptage des voix des législatives du 28 septembre qu 'elle qualifie de " cinéma " , premier étape vers un rejet d 'un scrutin qui serait remporté par le pouvoir du président alpha condé .
" nous avons demandé à nos représentants à la commission nationale de centralisation des votes qu 'ils se retirent " , a annoncé à l 'afp sidya touré , ancien premier ministre et porte-parole de la coalition des principaux partis d 'opposition .

ancic beat mertinak 7-6 6-3 6-4 milosevic grills croat presidentun tribunal : the trial has witnessed a heated exchange between the yugoslav ex-president and the croatian president stjepan mesic pm quits in tactical movereformist ivica racan has resigned , triggering the collapse of the 30-month old five-party government letter : on the 15th anniversary of the incarceration of the cuban five in the usa antigua-barbuda minister applauds mou between cxc and regional telecoms company après une remontée surprenante , lors de la demi-finale de la ligue de basketball élite du québec ( lbq élite ) , le pagé-dynamo ( 4e ) n ’ allait pas laisser la finale lui glisser entre les mains .
l ’ équipe de montréal a rapidement montré au révolution des laurentides ( 1er ) de quoi elle était capable en remportant le titre .
« c ’ est une belle sensation de gagner le championnat .
on se sent bien .
c ’ était aussi important pour nous de remporter la coupe devant nos partisans .
nous nous entraînons ici depuis le début .
c ’ est bien de finir ça ici » , a affirmé l ’ entraîneur-chef du dynamo , mario joseph , après la rencontre .
un début rapide et agressif ayant tiré de l ’ arrière pendant presque toute la demi-finale , le dynamo n ’ allait pas laisser la situation se répéter .
il a mis la pression sur les hommes des laurentides dès les premières secondes de la rencontre rendant leur construction de jeu de plus en plus difficile .
après 10 minutes d ’ affrontement , les basketteurs de m. joseph menaient 21 à 8 .
le révolution a tenté de réagir à l ’ intensité de son adversaire , mais sans grand succès .
les passes imprécises et la perte de contrôle du ballon ont été monnaie courante pour les visiteurs .
de plus , leur jeu défensif ne pouvait empêcher le dynamo de marquer .
l ’ écart a continué d ’ augmenter .
après deux quarts , le dynamo avait distancé son adversaire de 27 points .
baisse de régime étant partit sur sa lancée , le dynamo a baissé la cadence au plus grand plaisir du révolution au troisième quart .
l ’ équipe des laurentides a haussé le tempo et a diminué la distance entre les deux duellistes .
plus les minutes s ’ écoulaient , plus le révolution se rapprochait de son adversaire .
à moins d ’ une minute trente de la divulgation du gagnant , il ne restait plus que quatre points à l ’ écart que le dynamo s ’ était forgé depuis le début de la partie .
« les joueurs étaient dans une zone de confort .
ils n ’ avaient plus la même agressivité qu ’ avant .
c ’ est plus facile pour l ’ équipe adverse de remonter dans ces cas-là » , a expliqué m. joseph .
cette situation a été un réveil pour le dynamo .
ils ont recommencé à mettre la pression , provoquant des fautes du côté du révolution , ce qui a permis aux montréalais de repartir avec la victoire , par la marque de 77 à 70 .
« les joueurs ont mis beaucoup d ’ effort cette saison pour en arriver là aujourd ’ hui .
ils ont mis le temps et le travail .
toutefois , ce n ’ est pas seulement le talent qui nous a menés où nous sommes aujourd ’ hui .
ils devaient aussi jouer en équipe et c ’ est ce qu ’ ils ont fait » , a indiqué l ’ entraîneur-chef .
le dynamo est le nouveau champion de la lbq élite. want me to be a priest , then have me pass . ’ are st. ann in butte , st. rose of lima in home .

ortaca ve urlada hortum zarara neden olduhisarcıklıoğlu yeniden eurochambres başkan yardımcısı17 ekim 2013 perşembe 16 : 40son güncelleme : 21 : 34tobb başkanı hisarcıklıoğlu , eurochambres başkan yardımcılığına yeniden seçildi.i̇stanbul - türkiye odalar ve borsalar birliği ( tobb ) başkanı rifat hisarcıklıoğlu , avrupa ticaret ve sanayi odaları birliği ( eurochambres ) başkan yardımcılığına yeniden seçildi.eurocahmbres 'ın haliç kongre merkezi 'nde gerçekleştirilen genel kurulu 'nda birliğin yeni başkanı almanya ticaret odası başkanı richard weber oldu.rifat hisarcıklıoğlu 'nun yeniden başkan yardımcısı olarak seçildiği genel kurul 'da , 2014-2015 yılları arasında eurocahmbres 'ın başkan yardımcılığı görevini yürütecek diğer isimler avusturya ticaret odası 'ndan marta schultz , lüksenburg ticaret odası 'ndan pierre gramegna oldu.eurocahmbres yönetim kurulu üyeliklerine de fransa ticaret odası 'ndan andre marcon , i̇talya ticaret odası 'ndan michl ebner , polanya ticaret odası 'ndan andrzej arendarski ve i̇spanya ticaret odası 'ndan miquel valls i maseda seçildi . " ülkem ve türk iş dünyası açısından büyük bir onur ve gurur " eurochambres 'ın genel kurulu 'nda bugüne kadar görülmemiş rekor oyla tekrar başkan yardımcılığına seçildiğini belirten hisarcıklıoğlu , " daha önce 2010'da , ilk defa avrupa birliği ( ab ) üyesi olmayan bir ülkeden başkan yardımcılığına seçilmiştik .
o zaman da rekordu ama bu sefer enteresan bir sonuç çıktı .
83 oyun tamamını almış olmak ülkem ve türk iş dünyası açısından büyük bir onur ve gurur " dedi.eurocahmbres ekonomik forumu sonuçlarıtoplantıda , eurocahmbres ekonomik forumu 'nun sonuçları da eurochambres genel sekreteri arnaldo abruzzini tarafından paylaşıldı.abruzzini , forumda 4 ana konuya odaklandıklarını belirterek , şunları kaydetti : " birincisi yeni başlayan şirketlere yatırım , finansman ve desteklemek ve bunu da eğitsel ve destekleyici aktivitelerle yapmak üzerinde durduk .
i̇kinci olarak avrupa şirketlerinin uluslararası görüşe sahip olmaları gerekliliği ve odaların bu konudaki etkin olmaları öne çıktı.üçüncü olarak özellikle kadınlar başta olmak üzere girişimci potansiyellerinin önünün açılmasına odaklandık .
son olarak da avrupa 'da tekrar endüstriyelleşmenin önem kazanması ve endüstriyel sektördeki değer zincirinin bir parçası olarak ar-ge süreçlerinin desteklenmesi üzerinde durduk .
sonuç olarak odalar avrupa şirketlerinde değişimi yönetmeye talipler . "
anahtar kelimeler : türkiye odalar ve borsalar birliği , tobb , rifat hisarcıklıoğlu , avrupa ticaret ve sanayi odaları birliği , eurochambres , kaynak : yorumlarekonomi - diğerhisarcıklıoğlu yeniden eurochambres başkan yardımcısıirak 'ta üretilecek doğalgazın taliplisi olacağızruslar 3. ve 4. nükleer santrale de talipyöresel mimariye 10 bin lira teşviktürk firmaları çekingensanayinin ' en 'leriyabancılar türkiye 'de avm yatırımını cazip buluyorimf : türkiye 'de enflasyon yavaşladımaliye bin 700 akaryakıt istasyonunu inceleyecekzeytinde hasat şenlikle başlatılıyoropet 'e iki ödül birden " bayram fırsatları kampanyası " başladı " türk şirketler nükleer santral yatırımı yapabilir " ar-ge harcamalarının yarısı özel sektördenbuğdaygiller aynı oranda ekilecekdenizbank i̇letişim merkezi 'ne ödül ‘ lastik pazarı yine çift haneli büyüyecek ’ poncebloc türkiye 'defatih kıral büyümeye devam ediyor " türkiye enerji merkezi olacak " bnp paribas chose the two best bids for three of the five fields chevron has put up for sale in the niger delta . what a time to be alive !
a surprise trip to vermont for two nights in a cabin .

the one possibility i enjoy is that the message is written to be jealousy-inducing specifically for one individual who will likely be seeing it , whether it be an ex or a friend they hate .
that kind of malice is so extreme it crosses over the far line and becomes awesome .
description : an outpouring of love for no clear reason and aimed at no one in particular example : i just want to say how thankful i am for all of you who have touched my life .
your support means everything and i couldn 't have gotten through a lot of things in the last year without you !
my thoughts and prayers are with the families in newtown after this unspeakable tragedy .
i have no words to express my sorrow for those who lost a child .
" peace comes from within .
do not seek it without . " ~ buddha i don 't see what the big deal is about new years and people claiming how different they are going to be next year .
if you want to better yourself it shouldn 't matter what day of the year it is ...
me ?
im going to be the same person i am today tomorrow .
and so what exactly is the purpose of fb in your mind ?
as far as i can tell , there 's not a lot you can share that you wouldn 't find irritating or insufferable .
for those who don 't use it i would like to say that like anything facebook can certainly be a curse / drag / drain / waste , but it does have many great qualities and applications that can be put to good use like any tool by someone who is resourceful .

site map | terms of use | privacy statement | copyright & trademark notice | eeothe silsbee bee - obituaries on the bee the catholic church has a long and proven history of caring for the sick , the needy and the poor .
her religious , both men and women , as well as her laity have sacrificed so much to provide loving care for all in need .
what could possibly explain the government ’ s determination at this time not to allow this to continue ?
why are there no exemptions to allow the church to continue her charitable works that embrace , not simply catholics , but all persons in need ?
why is our religious freedom now in peril ?
why should we be required to comply with regulations against our beliefs ?
why must the church be forced to pay for legal fees to protect her rights to serve the poor and the needy , instead of using her resources to help them ?
the inability to dialogue on major issues facing our nation , the stubborn determination to hold to one ’ s own opinion and the reckless demonizing of those who hold another opinion have led to the shutdown of our government .
will the same intransigence lead to the shutdown of the many charitable works of the catholic church ?

it & # 8217 ; s a good way to build your clip portfolio : in order to get a job in print or online journalism you need a strong clip portfolio , and writing for a community paper is a terrific way to do that .
as i said earlier , community papers typically use a lot of articles from freelancers , so if you & # 8217 ; re eager to work it & # 8217 ; s possible to rack up a lot of clips in a relatively short period of time .
next , interview a few people to collect quotes that reflect the public ’ s perception of the event or story .
don & # 8217 ; t be intimidated by the idea of interviewing important or newsworthy people !
an interview can be as formal or informal as you want to make it , so relax and have fun with it .
find a few people with strong opinions and write down the responses for accuracy .
also let the interviewee know that you will be quoting him or her .
it can often be a lot of work , but it pays dividends and has become a trend for most online campaigns .
link-building is not an easy process , but can be done by those who understand what is required .
site map | terms of use | privacy statement | copyright & trademark notice | eeoburundi réalités m23 , les raisons d ’ une fissure et de la reddition de bosco ntaganda le 23 a éclaté en deux groupes qui se sont même affronté à l ’ arme lourde .
coup de théâtre ou réalité ?
des commentaires sont allés dans tous les sens .
pour ceux qui maitrisent la réalité de l ’ est du congo , tout ceci était né de cendres du cndp de laurent nkunda , le m23 avait dans son sein deux tendances antagonistes qui ont fini par étaler au grand public leurs c ’ est depuis 2009 que le clivage s ’ est établit au sein de ce qui va devenir le mécontent de la distance que laurent nkunda , alors chef du cndp , commençait à avoir vis-à-vis des hommes du pouvoir rwandais , kigali , de connivence avec kinshasa , va décider de le retirer de la scène pour passer la main à bosco ntaganda .
question de continuer à avoir la main mise sur toutes les transactions mis au froid au rwanda , laurent nkunda bénéficiait toujours de l ’ estime de nombreux combattants du cndp du nombre duquel se trouvait le colonel makenga .
soutenu par kigali et kinshasa , bosco ntaganda va se faire nommer général fardc avec plein pouvoir dans la région du kivu .
au nom de la paix , le pouvoir de ceci jusqu ’ au début de 2013 quand une forte pression internationale pesait sur kinshasa exigeant l ’ arrestation de bosco ntaganda et son transfèrement a la cpi .
mis au parfum de l ’ éventualité de son arrestation , bosco ntaganda va décider de faire défection des fardc et retourner dans le maquis .
l ’ occasion faisant le larron , les autres ex-combattants cndp intégrés dans le fardc vont trouver l ’ opportunité de revendiquer des insuffisances dans la mise en œuvre des bosco étant indexé par la cpi , le dévolu a été jeté sur sultani makenga pour diriger cette nouvelle insurrection .
le choix de sultani makenga rencontrait les attentes de kigali et kinshasa pour qui bosco ntaganda devenait très encombrant .
malgré cela , ce général rebelle continuait à avoir de l ’ emprise sur certains le 20 novembre 2012 , quand la ville de goma tombe entre les mains de m23 , des avis étaient très divergents quant à la manière de gérer cette victoire dans les la direction politique du m23 confiée à jean marie runiga ne parlait pas le même langage avec le chef militaire sultani makenga .
pour runiga et bosco ntaganda il fallait maintenir la pression sur la ville de goma et exiger des préalables à remplir par le gouvernement de kinshasa à défaut de continuer à pendant que la direction politique s ’ époumoner à faire prévaloir certains préalables , contre toute attente , sultani makenga va se rendre à kampala et décider unilatéralement de négocier avec kinshasa sans condition .
c ’ était comme une douche froide pour runiga , bosco ntaganda et les hommes de leur obédience , une pilule amère difficile à avaler .
a l ’ époque , certaines langues faisaient croire même que makenga a été soudoyé par le pouvoir de kinshasa pour accepter pendant les négociations de kampala , le m23 a été déclaré force négative par la ainsi la marge de manœuvre de cette rébellion .
de quoi inquiéter bosco ntaganda recherché par la cpi et jean marie runiga sous sanction de la communauté internationale .
la scission devenait donc impérieuse .
ce que vont tenter de faire le tandem runiga et bosco en ouvrant des hostilités contre les hommes de la tendance makenga .
mais , c ’ était sans compter avec kinshasa et kigali qui tenaient à se débarrasser de bosco ntaganda , ce témoin gênant .
les deux capitales ne voulaient plus de cet homme qui en savait déjà trop sur des magouilles de leurs pouvoirs respectifs à l ’ est de la rdc .
l ’ ordre a été donné à makenga de traquer bosco , le capturer et le déférer devant la justice .
tout toutes les tentatives de bosco ntaganda pour se retrancher vers le masisi ont été stoppées net par les hommes de makenga .
il ne lui restait qu ’ un plus choix : ntaganda se livre à la cpi , kinshasa et kigali court-circuités sentant venir le danger , aussitôt arrivé au rwanda , bosco ntaganda a vite fait de se rendre à l ’ ambassade des usa à kigali pour demander asile et son extradition à la cpi .
en agissant ainsi , cet ancien chef d ’ etat major du cndp a fait preuve d ’ une méfiance totale envers les pouvoirs de kigali et de kinshasa qu ’ il a longtemps servi .
l ’ homme redoutait même le pire pour sa vie .
la volonté de bosco ntaganda de se rendre à la cpi ne date pas d ’ aujourd ’ hui .
nos sources renseignent que ce général avait , en vain , demander au pouvoir de kinshasa de le dédommager pour le travail lui rendu avant de l ’ envoyer à la cpi .
un million de dollars , c ’ est la somme que ce général rebelle exigeait à kinshasa kinshasa , pour des raisons qui lui sont propres , n ’ avait jamais prêté oreille comme laurent nkunda , bosco ntaganda n ’ a pas été extradé en rdc par le rwanda .
c ’ est toute la mesure des bons rapports caractérisant le rwanda et la rdc .
l ’ histoire a tendance à toujours se répéter à l ’ est de la rdc s ’ agissant de sa situation sécuritaire .
depuis l ’ avènement de l ’ afdl en 1997 , cette partie du congo vit dans une insécurité quasi permanente .
transformée en sanctuaire des groupes armés , tant nationaux qu ’ étrangers , la partie orientale de la rdc ne rassure plus ses habitants confrontés , de manière permanente , à diverses ici , des rebellions naissent toujours des cendres d ’ autres .
c ’ est à croire qu ’ il y aurait une certaine programmation des malheurs qui s ’ abattent sur les populations de l ’ est de la rdc .
les tireurs des ficelles s ’ organiseraient pour maintenir la déstabilisation de la partie orientale du congo .
dans leurs tactiques , ils s ’ appuient sur des conflits identitaires qui minent cette contrée .
en 1996 , tout est partie d ’ une révolte de banyamulenge ( tusi ) qui avait fini par se muer en une rébellion dénommée afdl .
en 1998 , une brouille entre le pouvoir kabila père et ses mentors tutsi de l ’ afdl a donné naissance à la quand il fallait former le gouvernement de transition en 2004 , le rdc / goma est allé à kinshasa laissant derrière lui une troupe de réserve chapeauté par jules mutebusi et laurent nkunda .
c ’ est ce noyau laissé par le rcd qui a tout ceci porte à croire que la question de la survie tutsi en rdc préoccuperait plusieurs décideurs du monde au point qu ’ ils en feraient l ’ l ’ une des clés pour résoudre la question sécuritaire en rdc .
sinon , comment comprendre cette succession d ’ insurrection tutsi bénéficiant du soutien de certains milieux les clivages entre les différentes communautés linguistiques présentes dans la partie orientale du congo ainsi que la problématique d ’ exploitation des richesses naturelles de l ’ est du congo , sont d ’ autres raisons à la base de qu ’ adviendra-t-il après cette rébellion du m23 ?

police said anthony griego did not want to be arrested because he was on probation , so he led deputies on a 100 mph chase down us 84 .
the combination of insecurity and drought is making it hard to get humanitarian aid to the area .

zeytin hasat şenliği 'nin 26-27 ekim 2013 tarihleri arasında düzenleneceği belirtildi.akhisar ticaret borsası 'nın ev sahipliğini yapacağı " akhisar 5 .
zeytin hasat şenliği " ne , akhisar kaymakamlığı , akhisar belediyesi , akhisar ticaret ve sanayi odası , akhisar ziraat odası , ekonomi bakanlığı , türkiye odalar ve borsalar birliği , türkiye i̇hracatçılar meclisi , ege zeytin ve zeytinyağı i̇hracatçıları birliği , zeytin ve zeytinyağı tanıtım komitesi ve zeytindostu derneği destek veriyor.açıklamada görüşlerine yer verilen akhisar ticaret borsası yönetim kurulu başkanı alper alhat , futbol takımı ile spor toto süper lig ’ de zirve mücadelesi veren akhisar 'ın zeytincilik sektörünün süper liginde zirvedeki yerini uzun yıllar önce aldığını kaydetti.akhisar ve çevresinde 80 bin tonluk zeytin rekoltesi olacak2013-2014 sezonu için rekolte çalışmalarında akhisar 'da 75 bin ton sofralık zeytin , 10 bin ton zeytinyağı rekoltesi tahminleri yapıldığını belirten alhat , " rekolte çalışması tamamlandıktan sonra güzel yağışlar oldu .
akhisar ticaret borsası olarak bizim tahminimiz akhisar ve çevresinde 80 bin tonluk zeytin rekoltesinin olacağı yönünde .
türkiye ’ nin sofralık zeytin üretiminin yaklaşık yüzde 20-25'lik bölümü akhisar ve çevresinde yetiştiriliyor " açıklamasında bulundu.akhisar 'da kurulu 245 zeytin işleme tesisi , 35 zeytinyağı fabrikası bulunduğunu ifade eden alper alhat , zeytinin toplamasında çalışan işçilere bir sezonda yaklaşık 1,5 milyon adet yevmiye ödendiğini dile getirdi.zeytin ve zeytinyağı tesislerinde ortalama 15'er kişinin istihdam edildiğine dikkati çeken alhat , zeytincilik sektörünün akhisar 'a önemli bir katma değer bıraktığını vurguladı.alhat , etkinlik kapsamında , dalından hasat edilen zeytinlerin sofralık zeytin işleme tesisinde ve zeytinyağı fabrikasında zeytinin tarladan sofraya geldiği aşamaları katılımcılarla birlikte canlandırılacağını belirtti.2013-2014 sezonunda 140 bin ton zeytinyağı ve 390 bin ton sofralık zeytin rekolte tahmini yapılıyor .

the middle east or mideast is a region that encompasses western asia and all of or part of northern africa , depending on the context .
the term is considered to be eurocentric and used as a synonym for near east , in opposition to far east .
the corresponding adjective is middle-eastern and the derived noun is middle-easterner .

[ 11 ] the discovery that failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle \ sqrt or failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle f ( x , y,z ) = w ^ 2 and failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle g _ 3 or quotients of polynomials ; this would be what is sought for if such failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle x , y , z if a and b are coprime , then failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 for all failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle n \ geq 3 ( a fact completely beyond his methods ) appears only on his annotations on the margin of his copy of diophantus ; he never claimed this to others [ 47 ] and thus had no need to retract it if he found a mistake in his alleged proof. if and only if failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle p \ equiv 1 \ ; mod \ ; 4 in terms of its tools , as the study of the integers by means of tools from real and complex analysis ; [ 68 ] or and failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : b are rational numbers and failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : d can be factorised both as failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle 6 = 2 \ cdot 3 all of failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : 2 number fields are often studied as extensions of smaller number fields : a field l is said to be an extension of a field k if l contains k.
( for example , the complex numbers c are an extension of the reals r , and the reals r are an extension of the rationals q. )
classifying the possible extensions of a given number field is a difficult and partially open problem .
abelian extensions — that is , extensions l of k such that the galois group [ note 12 ] gal ( l / k ) of l over k is an abelian group — are relatively well understood .
their classification was the object of the programme of class field theory , which was initiated in the late 19th century ( partly by kronecker and eisenstein ) and carried out largely in 1900 — 1950 .
the central problem of diophantine geometry is to determine when a diophantine equation has solutions , and if it does , how many .
the approach taken is to think of the solutions of an equation as a geometric object. us a solution failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : x = a / c , failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : y = b / c the rephrasing of questions on equations in terms of points on curves turns out to be felicitous .
the finiteness or not of the number of rational or integer points on an algebraic curve — that is , rational or integer solutions to an equation failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : f ( x , y ) = 0 , where failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : f is a polynomial in two variables — turns out to depend crucially on the genus of the curve .
the genus can be defined as follows : [ note 13 ] allow the variables in failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : f ( x , y ) = 0 if failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ scriptstyle | x-a / q | < \ frac is an algebraic number .

( robson 2001 , pp . & # 160 ; 199-200 ) method : if we count by threes and there is a remainder 2 , put down 140 .
if we count by fives and there is a remainder 3 , put down 63 .
if we count by sevens and there is a remainder 2 , put down 30 .
add them to obtain 233 and subtract 210 to get the answer .
if we count by threes and there is a remainder 1 , put down 70 .
if we count by fives and there is a remainder 1 , put down 21 .
if we count by sevens and there is a remainder 1 , put down 15 .
when [ a number ] exceeds 106 , the result is obtained by subtracting 105 . ^ perfect and especially amicable numbers are of little or no interest nowadays .
the same was not true in medieval times – whether in the west or the arab-speaking world – due in part to the importance given to them by the neopythagorean ( and hence mystical ) nicomachus ( ca .
100 ce ) , who wrote a primitive but influential " introduction to arithmetic " .
see van der waerden 1961 , ch .

i judge him on the way he is standing , his voice , his hair , and his clothing .
and every single time , i find any excuse to say no .
i don ’ t mean to do it and i really don ’ t know why i do it .
i tell everyone else that i ’ m not picky at all .
friends will ask me , “ what ’ s your type ?
i know a great guy that i think you ’ ll like . ”
i just say i don ’ t have a type , describe him , and of course i say no thanks , continuing on my merry single life .
why is it that i do not want to be single , and yet i ’ m continuously giving myself reasons to be ?

how much does it cost to advertise in the best times ?
if i buy advertising , will you accept my press releases or articles for publication ?
our rates are based on receipt of electronic files .
you may e-mail us your completed ad as a high-resolution ’ pdf ’ or ’ jpg ’ file .
you may also provide the file on a cd ad design assistance is available at $ 50 per hour , at a minimum of one our deadline for reserving space is the third day of the month preceding publication .
the deadline for final proof approval or submission of electronic files is the eighth day of the month preceding publication .
prepayment of the first ad insertion is due the third day of the month preceding publication , unless other arrangements are made .
subsequent insertions will be invoiced and due on the last day of the month of publication .
the best times accepts mastercard and visa. third day of the month .
if cancelled , the cost would be adjusted accordingly .
for example , if you had a 12-time agreement for a quarter-page you would be invoiced for the difference between the three-time and 12 time yes .
you may change your ad each month .
we must receive notification of a pending ad change by the fifth of the month .
we am i restricted in what i can advertise in the best times ?
yes , businesses may have an ad flier or other insert included in the best we can also arrange the printing of fliers for inserting .
for printing and " at your service " is an option for advertisers who don 't find display ads and classified ads to be quite the right fit .
the " at your the cost of an at your service business card ad is an affordable $ 200 per we 've made it easy on you by eliminating the need for a contract .
to become an " at your service " advertiser , click on business card ad oas supports and certifies destruction of arms and ammunition in dominica liat to receive us $ 65 million from cdb for fleet modernisation cable channel cmt has revealed the cast of a new season of “ sweet home alabama , ” and as usual the show ’ s home state is well represented among the aspiring reality tv lovebirds gathered for production in the fairhope area .

but it is not the only priority .
the concern of christ and the catholic church for the suffering of the world , is not limited to any one group of people – born or unborn .
" it joins the humanity of the unborn infant and the humanity of the hungry ; it calls for positive legal action to prevent the killing of the unborn or the aged and positive societal action to provide shelter for the homeless and education of the illiterate . "
catholics , and all christians , cannot ignore the lord ’ s call to consistently build-up the kingdom of god – the kingdom jesus calls for in the last judgment scene of matthew ’ s gospel – where the hungry are fed , the thirsty are refreshed , the strangers are welcomed , the naked are clothed , the sick are cared for and prisoners are visited .
in pope emeritus benedict xvi ’ s words , & ldquo ; love for widows and orphans , prisoners , and the sick and needy of every kind , is as essential [ to the church ] as the ministry of the sacraments and preaching of the gospel . & rdquo ; ( & ldquo ; deus caritas est , & rdquo ; no. 22 ) . © 2013 indexmundi - all rights reservedvaudreuil-dorion - nouvellessociété nécrologie - première édition expérimentée et à leurs plateformes report a school or business closing / delay | kob.com my organization did not receivean id numberand password -ori 've lost my password - or my password is not working terms of use cina- eu lo yuan sempre più internazionale : scambi di valuta con la banca centrale europea - asia news & # 187 ; 11 / 10 / 2013 08 : 31cina- eulo yuan sempre più internazionale : scambi di valuta con la banca centrale europeafirmato un accordo per tre anni per lo scambio fino a 45 miliardi di euro e 350 miliardi di yuan .
un passo verso la piena convertibilità della moneta cinese .
pechino ( asianews / agenzie ) - la banca centrale cinese ( people 's bank of china , pboc ) ha firmato un accordo con la banca centrale europea ( bce ) per una linea swap in valuta , allargando ancora di più l 'uso dello yuan renminbi nella comunità internazionale .
l 'accordo , valido per tre anni , permette alla bce di accedere fino a 350 miliardi di yuan ( 42,2764 miliardi di euro ) ; la pboc può accedere fino a 45 miliardi di euro .
la linea swap permetterà alle banche centrali di acquistare e vendere yuan ed euro l 'una dall 'altra .
la diffusione dello yuan sarà possibile in tutta l 'area euro .
la pboc ha dichiarato che la mossa permetterà l 'uso della moneta cinese nei mercati stranieri , facilitando il commercio e gli investimenti .
in termini di valore , l 'accordo con la bce è terzo in volume di moneta , dopo quello con hong kong ( 400miliardi di yuan ) e con la corea del sud ( 360 miliardi di yuan ) .
secondo alcuni analisti , lo yuan sarà convertibile in pieno entro cinque anni.invia ad un amico visualizza per la stampa vedi anche08 / 09 / 2011 cinapechino “ per la piena convertibilità ” dello yuan entro il 201520 / 11 / 2007 cina – unione europeal ’ euro forte fa crollare le esportazioni ue verso pechino08 / 05 / 2009 cinapechino accumula minerali per sostituire il dollaro con lo yuan di wang zhicheng11 / 11 / 2011 cina - usal ’ asia “ deve fare di più ” per la ripresa economica globale14 / 09 / 2011 cina -uewen jiabao raffredda le speranze sui debiti dell ’ europa copyright © 2003 asianews c.f. 00889190153 tutti i diritti riservati : è permesso l 'uso personale dei contenuti di questo sito web solo a fini non commerciali .
l 'utilizzo per riprodurre , pubblicare , vendere e distribuire può avvenire solo previo accordo con l 'editore .
le foto presenti su asianews.it sono prese in larga parte da internet e quindi valutate di pubblico dominio .
se i soggetti o gli autori avessero qualcosa in contrario alla pubblicazione , non avranno che da segnalarlo alla redazione che provveder & agrave prontamente alla rimozione delle immagini utilizzate film review : “ the iran job ” - kabul press | afghanistan press | کابل پرس | افغانستان پرس 18 octobre 2013 - avocat et hommes d 'affaires , jean-françois labbé est candidat de l 'équipe denis coderre à la mairie d 'arrondissement .

dünya gazetesionline abonelike-gazeteyabancılar avm yatırımını cazip buluyor18 ekim 2013 cumaanasayfaekonomifinansdış haberlerpolitikatoplumsektörlerkategori̇lerfinansne , nerede , ne zamangündembi̇k i̇lanlarıdünya ihtdış i̇lişkileremtiai̇şletme-yönetimmevzuatnews in englishgüncelyorum i̇ncelemebölgelerdenözel dosyalarresmi gazetetiger monitorbankacılık sektörübilişimdemir-çelik sektörüenerji sektörügıda sektörühaberleşme sektörühizmetleri̇nşaat sektörükimya-petrokimya sektörümadencilik sektörümağazacılık-perakendecilik sektörümedya sektörüotomotiv sektörüplastik-kauçuk sektörüsanayisavunma sanayiisigortacılık sektörütarım ve hayvancılıktaşımacılık sektörütekstil sektörüturizm sektörü18 : 01 - i̇ddialar çok kötü bir kara propaganda örneği17 : 56 - kemer sıkma politikalarına devam17 : 51 - pfizerden az gelişmiş ülkelerin çocuklarına zatürre aşısı17 : 49 - farmavizyon eczacılık fuarı , 25 ekimde düzenlenecek17 : 35 - eskdan bir ilk17 : 26 - güneş tekrar yüzünü gösterecek17 : 22 - dünyada 30 milyon modern köle var17 : 19 - dünya enerji zirvesi i̇stanbulda buluşacak17 : 15 - oktay ekincinin cenazesi toprağa verildi16 : 53 - ortaca ve urlada hortum zarara neden oldusanayinin ' en 'leri17 ekim 2013 perşembe 12 : 43son güncelleme : 13 : 50i̇so en büyük 500 sanayi kuruluşu listesine giren sanayi devleri arasında kar artışı şampiyonluğunu antalyalı adopen plastik aldı.i̇smet özkul 'un anali̇zi̇i̇stanbul sanayi odası 'nın ( i̇so ) en büyük 500 sanayi kuruluşu listesine giren sanayi devleri arasında kar artışı şampiyonluğunu antalyalı adopen plastik aldı .
adopen plastik 2011 yılına göre karını 15.37 kat artırdı .
i̇kinci sırada yer alan assan alüminyum karını 14.95 kat , üçüncü adoçim çimento ise 14.89 kat artırdılar.vergi öncesi kârı en fazla artanlari̇so 2012 sırasıi̇so 2011 sırasıkuruluşlarbağlı bulunduğu oda / kamu2012 ( tl ) 2011 ( tl ) değişim % 310266adopen plastikantalya24.084.1951.470.6751537,635951assan alüminyumi̇stanbul86.195.9775.402.9791495,34432431adoçim çimentotokat27.691.0481.742.8791488,8189119jti tütün ürünleriege bölgesi101.897.8636.883.6251380,29155167limak çimentosiirt61.629.7044.934.5441148,946559hes hacılar elektrikkayseri37.954.2383.341.8141035,74269331kalde klimai̇stanbul17.481.7501.596.068995,301413vestel elektroniki̇stanbul121.715.10715.898.006665,60215207gübre fabrikalarıi̇stanbul214.018.00636.233.023490,67165175hema endüstrii̇stanbul21.423.0024.073.003425,98314352agt ağaç sanayiantalya46.518.4209.031.050415,09119146kaleseramiki̇stanbul15.677.5293.109.798404,13182230has çelikkayseri24.155.0905.094.194374,178583besler gıdai̇stanbul42.390.3099.373.583352,23462460sun tekstiltorbalı8.654.7041.941.181345,85109107türk prysmian kablobursa13.861.4353.175.607336,50379422akova sütkonya12.114.4622.811.505330,899396ülker çikolatai̇stanbul125.051.66229.337.649326,25359398nuh 'un ankara makarnasıankara24.212.1285.851.861313,75193295roketsanankara189.572.68046.861.030304,54 « geri123456789101112131415161718ileri » yorumlarekonomi - today 's zaman country is lao people 's democratic republic .
in lao , sathalanalat pasathipatai pasason lao. routes between thailand , vietnam and china now makes it a country to be courted by its internationalizing neighbors .
arr 1220 thursday & sunday.luang phrabang to vientiane dep 1250 ancient cultural artifacts are prohibited to be taken out of laos .
if you have on arrival at wattaya international airport in vientiane , taxis are available to savannakhet and pakse , the khong falls , and low water levels during the dry transportation : nam ou , nam khan , nam tha , nam hgur , and se don .
lao pdr has 13100 km of main road networks .
the 3390 km of national roads link the central telephone office is located on setthathilath road near nam phu the local newspaper to read is the vientiane times and if you want to check as the site known as ( www.vientianetimes ) has nothing to do with the where you can also receive a copy of the chiangmai trader news pcs.production.1.20130918.1036 ( pewsuwvmwapp02 ) infos de dernière minute , photos et opinions sur al huffington post maghreb journée mondiale de l ’ alimentation contre la faim et le gaspillage politique - nonobstant ce conservatisme travesti , les " progressistes " en tunisie fustigent l 'idée d 'un combat contre les courants dits " réactionnaires " , assimilés - à tort - au conservatisme .
pourtant , les divergences entre les deux pôles ne semblent pas bien délimitées .
l 'internet aujourd 'hui accessible et omniprésent est source de distractions sans fin que nous-mêmes en tant qu 'adulte nous avons de la peine à gérer.alors voici une ébauche de dix règles à respecter pour éviter que vos enfants passent trop de temps devant leurs écrans .
eau - c 'est donc la déchirure d 'une pièce en acier intercalée entre deux conduites en fonte qui serait à l 'origine de la pénurie sans précédent d 'eau potable dans la capitale sénégalaise .
toute justification de la faillite d 'un ouvrage d 'ingénierie , qui représente un risque à la sécurité au public , ne peut être réduite à " une défaillance d 'ordre technique " , de surcroît trop précipitamment médiatisée comme imprévisible .
mariage gay - moi , dominique , je suis français .
moi mohammed , je suis marocain .
nous vivons ensemble depuis un bon bout de temps .
en mars dernier , nous nous sommes pacsés .
les mois suivants , la loi du mariage pour tous est entrée en vigueur .
c 'était très tentant ...
pourquoi pas nous , après tout ?
liberté d 'expression - ceux ayant ordonné l 'arrestation d 'anouzla voient-ils court ?
leur volontarisme , loin de créer un coupable , enfante un martyr de la liberté d 'expression .
et la presse , au lieu de fédérer ses forces pour dénoncer le message terroriste d 'aqmi , se consacrera tout naturellement et prioritairement à la défense de son bastion contre une tentative de liberticide .
voilà que la lutte antiterroriste s 'emballe , tourne contre-productive , octroie gracieusement à la menace terroriste plus de consistance , en la couvrant d 'un nuage médiatique l 'ayant ( presque ) faite oublier .
en tunisie comme partout dans le monde musulman , l 'aïd-el-kébir porte aussi le nom d 'aïd-el-idha , c 'est à dire la fête du sacrifice .
comme le disait si bien le docteur calmette " le présent est lourd du passé " .
beaucoup de nos gestes d 'aujourd 'hui nous ramènent à la réalité d 'autrefois .
quotidien de l 'aïd - oui , le tunisien aime toucher le mouton .
il suffit de se rendre au terrain vague du quartier pour y voir des hommes de tous âges , fébriles , souriants , observant , jaugeant ces belles touffes de poils , cette belle laine duveteuse , ces yeux doux évoquant la jouissance du méchoui , l 'extase du couscous , la volupté des côtelettes , la luxure de la hergma !
méditerranée - une très grande partie de la responsabilité du grand cimetière marin est à trouver du côté des dirigeants africains , qui devraient proposer à leurs jeunesses un projet politique , économique et social attrayant , possible et surtout qui engloberait l 'ensemble de la population .
prix nobel de la paix , fondateur de la grameen bank développement - il est plus important que jamais de réévaluer le concept de capitalisme .
continuerons-nous à sacrifier l 'environnement , notre santé et le futur de nos enfants dans la poursuite effrénée du profit du pouvoir , ou prendrons-nous le destin de la planète en main société - il va sans dire que le " progressisme " est une notion floue .
bien qu 'elle soit fréquemment utilisée , elle n 'en demeure pas moins équivoque , même au vu des sociétés à ancienneté démocratique .
le progressisme n 'est pas en totale rupture avec l 'actuel .
son intention n 'est pas de révolutionner l 'ordre établi , mais de l 'améliorer , progressivement , pour un devenir meilleur .
peine de mort - inefficace face au crime , injuste , jamais à l 'abri d 'erreurs et cependant irréparable , la peine de mort est un échec de la justice .
pourtant , chaque année , dans le monde entier , des milliers de femmes et d 'hommes sont condamnés à la peine capitale .
au cours des dernières décennies , la peine de mort a reculé .
deux tiers des etats de la planète l 'ont abolie ou adopté un moratoire .
mais des chiffres , accablants , demeurent : 58 pays l 'appliquent encore .
littérature - si le chef d 'œuvre de nabokov a su s 'attirer , en même temps que la gloire d 'une renommée mondiale , une moisson heureuse de commentaires , il reste pourtant un roman qui n 'en aura pas moins manqué de garder en suspens certaines questions quant à son sens véritable .
il renferme trois énigmes .
auxquelles je pense avoir trouvé des réponses .
l 'eau à dakar : services publics , intérêts privés et choix stratégiques ( partie 1 ) mariage gay entre français et étrangers : " la justice s 'acharne contre nous " les syriens " autorisés " à manger du chien et du chat pour ne pas mourir de faimflickr / freedomhouse | flickr accès aux tic : la tunisie 2ème pays du maghreb , à la 91ème place mondialeflickr / rusty clark | flickr un 23 octobre sous tension ? nacer talel pour le huffpost maghreb ondes électromagnétiques : pas d 'effet " avéré " sur la santé ? afples antennes de téléphonie mobile sont-elles nocives pour la santé ?
le dernier soldat français est parti il y a 50 ans ... présidence du gouvernement tn une lettre ouverte et 13 dessins à l 'attention de moncef marzoukicomité de soutien de jabeur mejri le dernier prix nobel 2013 revient à ... flickr / solis invicti | flickr une nouvelle embarcation chargée d 'immigrés subsahariens arrive à lampedusamarine italienne / afp des travailleurs humanitaires enlevés dans le nord de la syrieafp " la feuille de route ne peut être appliquée à la lettre " facebook / ali laridh les plus beaux clichés de la vie sauvage en 2013wildlife photographer of the year david bowie , l 'anglais le " mieux habillé de tous les temps " l 'extrême droite belge interdite de semelles rouges , louboutin lance une collection pour toutesflickr / valeyoshino | flickr 10 choses qu 'on ne fait plus à cause de nos écransgetty comment les jeux vidéo renforcent la culture du violcrystal dynamics ce bug de l 'iphone 5s doit faire sourire microsoftvine : drbradleysmiller dünya gazetesionline abonelike-gazeteyabancılar avm yatırımını cazip buluyor18 ekim 2013 cumaanasayfaekonomifinansdış haberlerpolitikatoplumsektörlerkategori̇lerfinansne , nerede , ne zamangündembi̇k i̇lanlarıdünya ihtdış i̇lişkileremtiai̇şletme-yönetimmevzuatnews in englishgüncelyorum i̇ncelemebölgelerdenözel dosyalarresmi gazetetiger monitorbankacılık sektörübilişimdemir-çelik sektörüenerji sektörügıda sektörühaberleşme sektörühizmetleri̇nşaat sektörükimya-petrokimya sektörümadencilik sektörümağazacılık-perakendecilik sektörümedya sektörüotomotiv sektörüplastik-kauçuk sektörüsanayisavunma sanayiisigortacılık sektörütarım ve hayvancılıktaşımacılık sektörütekstil sektörüturizm sektörü18 : 01 - i̇ddialar çok kötü bir kara propaganda örneği17 : 56 - kemer sıkma politikalarına devam17 : 51 - pfizerden az gelişmiş ülkelerin çocuklarına zatürre aşısı17 : 49 - farmavizyon eczacılık fuarı , 25 ekimde düzenlenecek17 : 35 - eskdan bir ilk17 : 26 - güneş tekrar yüzünü gösterecek17 : 22 - dünyada 30 milyon modern köle var17 : 19 - dünya enerji zirvesi i̇stanbulda buluşacak17 : 15 - oktay ekincinin cenazesi toprağa verildi16 : 53 - ortaca ve urlada hortum zarara neden olduvideo d5.haftanın değerlendirilmesi eko futbol programında bu hafta büyük olaylı geçip tatil olan beşiktaş-galatasaray derbisi ve oynanan maçlar ele alındı.eklenme tarihi : 25 eylül 2013 / 11 : 00son güncelleme : 00 : 00bu video 9517 kez izlendi .
benzer videolar5.haftanın değerlendirilmesinba 'de finaller başlıyor [ rüzgardan gol yedikenyalı liseliler , yüksek atlıyorkar motoruyla yamaçtan aşağıferreira 'yı unutup bebeğin golüne sevindilerkentucky derbisi 'ni siz de kazanın ! nba yıldızları dansta da başarılıtopuk pasıyla ' alley-oop ' * time by topictrecut şi prezent în politica externa românească | cadran politic home idei contemporane trecut şi prezent în politica externa românească posted by florin constantiniu on mar 25th , 2003 / / comments off istoria românilor alatura exemple de uluitor curaj si de totala neîncredere în fortele proprii istoria românilor alatura exemple de uluitor curaj si de totala neîncredere în fortele proprii .
mircea cel batrân , vlad tepes , stefan cel mare si alti voievozi au cautat alianta unor mari puteri crestine în lupta cu imperiul otoman & # 8211 ; pâna în secolul al xvi-lea , o adevarata superputere a epocii & # 8211 ; dar , când concursul militar al acestor puteri a lipsit , ei nu au sovait sa stea singuri în fata unui adversar de o coplesitoare superioritate ; au facut-o pentru a-si apara tara lor , dar au avut si constiinta unui mare rost european , asa cum o spune raspicat stefan cel mare în solia sa catre venetia din 1477 : & # 8220 ; nu vreau sa mai spun cât de folositoare este pentru treburile crestine aceasta tara a mea ; socotesc ca este de prisos fiindca lucrul e prea limpede ca ea este cetatea de aparare a tarii unguresti si a poloniei si straja acestor doua craii .
afara de aceasta , fiindca turcul s-a împiedicat de mine , multi crestini au ramas în liniste de patru ani & # 8221 ; .
când soarta armelor nu le-a fost favorabila , ei nu s-au descurajat , asa cum reiese si din inscriptia pusa de acelasi stefan la biserica din razboieni , ridicata în 1496 , acolo unde fusese înfrânt cu douazeci de ani înainte de sultanul mehmed al ii-lea : & # 8220 ; s-a ridicat prea puternicul mahmet , împarat turcesc , cu toate puterile sale rasaritene ; si înca si basarab voievod , numit laiota , a venit cu el , cu toata tara basarabeasca ( tara româneasca , numita astfel dupa dinastia basarabilor & # 8211 ; n.n. ) .
si au venit sa prade si sa ia tara moldovei ; si au ajuns pâna aici , la locul numit valea alba .
iar noi , stefan voievod si cu fiul nostru alexandru , am iesit înaintea lor si am facut mare razboi cu ei , în luna iulie 26 ; si cu voia lui dumnezeu , au fost înfrânti crestinii de pagâni .
si au cazut aici multime mare de osteni ai moldovei .
tot atunci si tatarii au lovit tara moldovei din ceia parte & # 8221 ; .
relatarea atât e obiectiva a unui esec & # 8211 ; sa recunoastem & # 8211 ; este cu totul rara la oamenii politici .
în alte împrejurari se constata o adevarata spaima când este evocata posibilitatea unei confruntari cu poarta otomana .
astfel , în 1658 , când domnul tarii românesti , mihnea al iii-lea ( era grec ! ) , le propune boierilor sa se ridice împotriva imperiului otoman , acestia vadesc o totala lipsa de încredere în victorie : & # 8220 ; doamne , bun lucru ar fi acesta !
iar noi ne temem ca nu vom putea plini desavârsit , ci numai vom zadarî sarpele si ne va înghiti cu totul .
caci noi sântem o tara mica si far de oameni , neputincioasa si far de ajutor de nici o parte .
iar turcii sunt puternici , mari si biruiesc toata lumea , de la rasarit la apus & # 8221 ; .
nimic din curajul lui stefan cel mare !
aceeasi gândire politica , exprimata în termeni similari de unul dintre cei mai vârstnici oameni politici români , în 1914 , theodor rosetti , cumnatul lui cuza voda , care , în consiliul de coroana de la sinaia , convocat pentru a fixa atitudinea româniei în razboiul ce tocmai izbucnise , a spus : & # 8220 ; suntem o tara mica , un biet popor , iesit abia de ieri , de alaltaieri , din greutati si din robie .
nu cred ca sta în putinta noastra sa facem politica mare .
acum cei mari s-au încaierat , noi nu avem ce cauta în luptele lor .
sa stam deci linistiti la o parte , sa ne vedem de nevoile si de necazurile noastre si sa ne caznim sa pastram ceea ce cu atâta truda am agonisit & # 8221 ; .
cine urmareste politica externa a româniei în perioada post-decembrista , constata ca ea este dominata de felul de a gândi al boierilor munteni de la 1658 sau & # 8211 ; pâna la un punct & # 8211 ; al lui theodor rosetti , la 1914 .
întocmai ca si dupa primul razboi mondial , când garantiile de securitate au fost cautate cu precadere în exterior ( franta si anglia , mica întelegere , întelegerea balcanica , alianta româno-polona ) , si astazi , se crede ca garantiile de securitate vin din includerea româniei în nato .
doua observatii sunt aici de facut : 1 ) .
nato din perioada post-comunista , nu mai este nato din perioada razboiului rece ; disparitia amenintarii sovietice a lasat teren liber de manifestare a divergentelor si tensiunilor dintre aliati .
încordarea dintre sua si & # 8220 ; vechea europa & # 8221 ; ( franta , germania ) este o dovada graitoare ; 2 ) .
cine ameninta românia în momentul de fata ?
cu bulgaria si ungaria nu mai avem nici un litigiu teritorial ; ucrainei , tratatul din 1997 i-a dat teritorii românesti , la care probabil , nici nu visa ; rusia nu mai este vecina cu românia .
atunci ? & # 8220 ; noile amenintari & # 8221 ; ?
terorismul ?
în realitate , prin urmarea orbeasca a sua , românia se expune loviturilor teroriste .
retorica propagandei americane vrea sa acrediteze ideea ca , în prezent , are loc o confruntare între lumea civilizata si terorism .
nu este adevarat .
terorismul islamic este o componenta a conflictului din orientul mijlociu , iar ostilitatea sa fata de sua , o consecinta a pozitiei adoptate de sua în acest conflict , pozitie perceputa de fundamentalistii islamici ca antiaraba si antiislamica .
în conditiile unei confruntari asimetrice , partea slaba recurge la mijloace neconventionale de lupta , în speta acte teroriste .
din dorinta de a fi admisi în nato , am sacrificat ucrainei teritorii românesti la care kievul nu avea nici un drept .
atunci , în 1997 , sua s-au opus intrarii româniei în nato .
dupa 11 septembrie 2001 , interesat sa transforme nato într-un simplu instrument al politicii externe a sua si sa-si extinda controlul asupra unui numar cât mai mare de tari , washingtonul si-a aruncat privirile si asupra româniei .
guvernantii de la bucuresti , nesiguri de ei , apasati de banuiala de neo- sau criptocomunism , aveau nevoie de o legitimare din partea serifului mondial , sua .
au alergat în întâmpinarea dorintelor lui cu un servilism de prost gust , care a compromis tara noastra .
în jelania sa , theodor rosetti spunea ca românia nu trebuie sa se amestece în certurile dintre cei mari .
guvernantii nostri , tematori ca si theodor rosetti , n-au mers cu logica fricii pâna la capat : mai simplu spus , & # 8220 ; sa stea în banca lor & # 8221 ; .
nu , în dorinta de a fi pe placul washingtonului si a primului lor vasal , marea britanie , au criticat pozitia rationala a frantei .
ei nu înteleg ca , pentru o tara ca românia , coordonatele securitatii sunt un sistem multipolar sanatos si o institutie care sa impuna respectul legalitatii internationale .
activitatea politica si diplomatica a tarii noastre în ultimul timp pare a voi sa ilustreze afirmatia lui emil cioran : & # 8220 ; a fi român înseamna a fi o fiinta cu multa apa în sânge & # 8221 ; . © 2003 cadran politic · rss · designed by theme junkie · powered by wordpresschina ’ s newly rich - the washington post as china increases in wealth , more people are turning to luxuries such as cosmetic surgery .

however there are foreigners and thais who still ply their trade by trying to take what is not theres so watch out and keep your bags safe .

he was arrested for shop-lifting and the thai police extortion price was rm30,000 for his release .
he spent two nights in jail and paid rm50 for an air-cond cell , 200-300 baht for each visitor , and rm11,000 for his final release .

expressing his appreciation for recent developments in turkey , solheim said that the aid provided to africa and to somalia by turkey in particular drew their attention .
" turkey has become an effective power around the world .
your country is already a member of the oecd but not dac , so we are now proposing that you be a part of the committee , " solheim said .
for his part , bozdag thanked solheim in the meeting , saying that turkey will consider the dac membership offer and that turkey 's humanitarian aid will increasingly continue and increase in the future as well .

publications weigh in on the megabank on the eve of its earnings report. is one of the ancient games played in afghanistan .
the name of this game is perhaps on the basis of popular beliefs and legends , one could say this game was played for the first time in the oxus basin .
our people had earlier domisticated the horse and used to law inscribed on bull 's hide in gold and hung it on the gates of bactria .
according to subject-matter is the horse , one should say that two types of horses are more wellknown in afghanistan : one is the " qataghani " type which is smaller in size but strong and sturdy , the other raised in the steppes of faryab and balkh is larger.both types are used the horseman snatches the careas of a calf as they have already learned the tricks .
the hungry for part of the day and rides it daily a fairly long distance .
this is meant to blond horse is referred to as " samand " , a red one as " jayran " and a could say horsemanship in afghanistan was customary during the vedic times .
the people in the oxus basin had domisticated the horse in order to defend their homeeland against the fighting on horseback was discontinued , the horse come to be used as a means of transport in the first place and a vehidle to play bozkashi in the second. bozkashi because usually a hand to hand fightfollowed a cavalary campaign .
a horseman had to be strong and adept enough to beat his opponents on the ground as well .
now wrestling is considered as an ancient game like bozkashi and it is done in sunny days of spring .
it to unwritten rules of the fames .
for instance , one cannot hold one 's opponents by the leg latter displayed their mettle as adept horsemen and wrestlers .
so bozkashi may be regarded baghlan , samangan , jozjan , and faryab are good bozkashilayers and is is played on special only in summer to celebrate weddings but elsewhere , there is no set time. bozkashi is usually , a calf is beheaded , its four legs are cut off from the knee , its insides emptied most of the bozkashi horses belong to rich men who can afford to buy them and hire horseman can get any horses they lay their hands upon to use in a bozkashi match. game , nobody can tie the carcase of his saddle or hit his opponent on the hand to snatch may take up to a week till a particular team is annonunced the winner , a horse race is skul fracture , bleeding hands , a cut in the ear , broken nose or a cut in the lips does not enthusiastic about a national game as the afghans are about bozkzshi .
kutuplaşma terk edilmeli dünya gazetesionline abonelike-gazeteyabancılar avm yatırımını cazip buluyor18 ekim 2013 cumaanasayfaekonomifinansdış haberlerpolitikatoplumsektörlerkategori̇lerfinansne , nerede , ne zamangündembi̇k i̇lanlarıdünya ihtdış i̇lişkileremtiai̇şletme-yönetimmevzuatnews in englishgüncelyorum i̇ncelemebölgelerdenözel dosyalarresmi gazetetiger monitorbankacılık sektörübilişimdemir-çelik sektörüenerji sektörügıda sektörühaberleşme sektörühizmetleri̇nşaat sektörükimya-petrokimya sektörümadencilik sektörümağazacılık-perakendecilik sektörümedya sektörüotomotiv sektörüplastik-kauçuk sektörüsanayisavunma sanayiisigortacılık sektörütarım ve hayvancılıktaşımacılık sektörütekstil sektörüturizm sektörü18 : 01 - i̇ddialar çok kötü bir kara propaganda örneği17 : 56 - kemer sıkma politikalarına devam17 : 51 - pfizerden az gelişmiş ülkelerin çocuklarına zatürre aşısı17 : 49 - farmavizyon eczacılık fuarı , 25 ekimde düzenlenecek17 : 35 - eskdan bir ilk17 : 26 - güneş tekrar yüzünü gösterecek17 : 22 - dünyada 30 milyon modern köle var17 : 19 - dünya enerji zirvesi i̇stanbulda buluşacak17 : 15 - oktay ekincinin cenazesi toprağa verildi16 : 53 - ortaca ve urlada hortum zarara neden oldu " kutuplaşma terk edilmeli " 15 ekim 2013 salı 12 : 05eski chp genel başkanı ve antalya milletvekili deniz baykal , i̇slamın bir barış dini olduğunu ancak barışa en çok susamış insanların da müslüman olduğunu söyledi.antalya -kurban bayramını memleketi antalya 'da geçiren baykal , bayram namazını tekeli mehmet paşa camisi 'nde kıldı .
baykal , namazın ardından kentteki bir börekçiye giderek börek yedi .
baykal burada gazetecilere yaptığı açıklamada , i̇slam aleminin bayramını kutladı .
bayramların insanın kendisini sorgulaması ve vicdan muhasebesi yapmasına vesile olduğunu ifade eden baykal , " i̇slam , barış dini ama maalesef barışa en çok susamış insanların müslümanlar olduğunu görüyoruz , bu acı bir tespit .
i̇slamı gerçek bir barış ortamı haline dönüştürme zorunluluğumuz var .
bu tabii sadece müslümanların elinde olan bir şey değil , dünyanın da i̇slama bakışını gözden geçirmesi gerekir " dedi.dünyanın i̇slama bakışında çok büyük yanlışlıkların olduğuna işaret eden baykal , i̇slam dünyasına iç savaşın , mezhep kavgalarının , şiddetin hakim olduğunu kaydetti .
huzur ve barışı bozmaktan herkesin kaçınması gerektiğini vurgulayan baykal , şunları söyledi : " i̇ktidar sahipleri , dini bütünleştirme , kaynaştırma değil de ayrıştırma , çatıştırma , dinden sevgi değil husümet çıkarma , uyum değil çatışma çıkarma anlayışını bir an önce terk etmeliler .
ülkenin buna ihtiyaçı var .
i̇slam dünyasında barış mesajını en yüksek şekilde dile getirilmesi gerekirken ne yazık ki bazıları tarafından kendi dünyamıza çatışmanın davetini yapar hale dönüştürülüyor .
böyle karmaşık tablonun içinde bayramı yaşıyoruz .
artık türkiye 'yi çatıştırarak , kutuplaştırarak belli hedeflere ulaşma anlayışı terk edilmeli .
millet caydırıcı bir tavır takınarak buna tevessül edenleri yönlendirmeli . "

woods looks like his old self with win at doral map of doral floridatiger woods earned his 76th career pga tour title with a two-shot victory at doral tiger owner of all majorswoods becomes the first golfer to hold all 4 major titles at the same time .
he held off duval and mickelson to win the masters the extreme dryness of the air causes any heat that is radiated back into the atmosphere to be lost instead of being absorbed by the water vapor in the atmosphere .
the source of this energy is the sun , and because its heating effect is greater at the equator than at the poles , it creates a circulation in the atmosphere .
hot moist air rises over the equator and flows at a high level towards the poles , where it cools and sinks .
the equator is therefore a region of low pressure , and the poles are regions of high pressure .
the atmosphere is not a closed system .
it interacts with the land , the ocean , and the ice ; and the ice in turn interacts with the ocean.winds create currents in the ocean .
the annual cycle of freezing and melting of the sea ice around antarctica creates a vertical circulation in the ocean .

( 10 / 15 / 2013 3 : 06 : 54 am ) namibia says it won ’ t cut tax rate for anglo ’ s namdeb gem miner feds mum on whether they 'll refer nadon challenge to top courtsun news networkthe making of the harper courtthe globe and mailsee all 4 sourcesrelated marc nadon how to get there : from suvannabhumi airport , bangkok , buses leave all the time for pattaya and cost 173 baht to jomtien or & cost 200 baht to the bus tgerminal on pattaya north rd .
avis offer a limo service for 2,200 or take a train from pattaya to bangkok 33 baht then hop on the overnight to the police can 't or won 't help you if you hire a jet ski then you sink it or turn sharply and it fills up with water .
the motto in thailand " whatever you hire whatever is damaged stolen or lost , you pay " so you hire a bike , or jetski at your own risk .
you can however negotiate a lesser amount which you are nuts if you don 't do but never say you will pay as then the price remians the same or can now go higher .
to hire a jet ski can cost you around 800baht per 1 / 2 hour but in september 2009 they want 1000baht per 1 / 2 hour .
good fun but don 't hit anyone swimming or damage the jetski as it will cost you .
there is no such thing as insurance for jet ski hire so you do so knowing if something goes wrong you pay .
if you blow the motor then its your fault so remember these things if youre game enough to rent one .
for my money stay clear of the damn things & there is a scam at the moment as times are tight at the moment .
as you will find when it happens to you hiring a jetski can be bliss or a nightmare .
many of the jetskis are thrashed by their thai owners and they can be bought second hand at jssr auction for 100,000baht or so .
but most people who hire them are never asked to see a check sheet of damage or any dents rips etc in the coulings etc so once you bring it back the nice ride can turn into a nightmare .
some times the thais will not even let you leave the beach but as you have no money you demand to see a tourist police .
in pattaya they have 2 foreigners on hand at the beach rd police station .
insist on it or send someone to bring them back ?
these jetskis in pattaya & phuket are thrashed and when they start using oil its easy to drain them and let you hire it ? ? ? --guess who pays & the asking price for a a new motor min 77,000baht .

sonuçta bu gelir getiren bir iş ve biz de konuya kazanım açısından bakıyoruz " dedi.rauf kasumov , aa muhabirine yaptığı açıklamada , 3 yıldır türk öğrencilerin rusya 'da nükleer enerji alanında eğitim aldıklarını söyledi.bugüne kadar yaklaşık 200 öğrencinin bu eğitimlerden yararlandığını anlatan kasumov , eğitim programının , ilk yıl rus dili eğitimi , 5 yıl üniversite eğitimi , 1 ile 3 yıl faaliyette olan rusya 'daki bir nükleer güç santralinde uygulama eğitimi olmak üzere , 7-10 yıla yayılan bir süreç olduğunu anlattı .
kasumov , bu aşamada yaklaşık 600 kişiye eğitim vermeyi planladıklarını ifade etti.akkuyu nükleer güç santrali projesinin geleceğinin türkiye-rusya ilişkilerine bağlı olduğu değerlendirmelerinin anımsatılması üzerine kasumov , kimsenin 20 milyar dolarlık bir projenin heba olmasını istemeyeceğini söyledi .
ekonomik öncelikli bir konunun siyasi ilişkilerden etkilenmeyeceğini vurgulayan kasumov , " i̇ki ülke arasında 20 milyar doların toprağa gömülmesine neden olacak nasıl bir sorun olabilir ki " dedi.türkiye 'de 3. ve 4. nükleer santrallerin yapımına sıcak baktıklarını ifade eden kasumov , " 3. ve 4. nükleer santralleri de yapmak isteriz .
sonuçta bu gelir getiren bir iş ve biz de konuya kazanım açısından bakıyoruz " diye konuştu .

avec ses accords de nectar de cassis , de chypre moderne et de bois blond musqué , ce parfum diffuse une odeur sensuelle et chaleureuse .
un masque éclaircissant inédit inspiré de l 'iontophorès , un soin de beauté qui sature la peau d 'une quantité importante d 'ingrédients éclaircissants .
grâce à la puissance de la technologie force lonique , les ingrédients éclaircissants sont absorbés au cœur même de la peau pour des résultats encore plus efficaces .
une fois le masque retiré , votre peau est fraîche et lumineuse et son teint est plus régulier .
qui hydrate , unifie et illumine mon teint instantanément .
avec ses polyphénols de raisin brevetés , elle protège contre les uv , la pollution , le stress qui eux sont responsable du vieillissement de notre peau à 80 % .
cet embellisseur de teint est pour tous les types de peaux , est non comédogène et non testé sur les animaux .
offert en 2 teintes en plus d ’ une poudre compacte minérale !

thank you for inviting me to provide my perspective on where the past year has taken us and where we should go from here .
that made for a geographic hybrid , and in a wartime wilderness idaho was left to create its own identity and its own way forward .
it was the birth of idaho ’ s fierce independence and steadfast commitment to individual liberty that remain defining qualities of our state and our people .
now most of us live in relative comfort and plenty – the frontier tamed , the desert abloom , our state and the world seemingly filled with marvels our pioneer forefathers never imagined .
but the search for our own identity and way forward continues .
idaho is a work in progress , and what ’ s past is prologue .
we are the products of the “ new birth of freedom ” that lincoln proclaimed at gettysburg .
i hope you share my commitment to ensuring that our state government never grows as fast as our economy and the people ’ s ability to pay for it .
it also reflects great uncertainty due to irresponsible federal leadership , and our continuing need for caution and prudence in the collection and expenditure of the people ’ s hard-earned dollars .
there was no electoral mandate for the changes we proposed on november 6th .
but i also heard no clarion call for the status quo .
but i believe there are areas in which we can make progress , and i encourage you and all citizens to engage in that public discussion .
it ’ s our very best chance to strengthen the foundation of our future .
i would be remiss today if i failed to extend my gratitude to the j.a. and kathryn albertson foundation for its continued generous financial support of idaho education .
that ’ s a godsend for our efforts to improve and expand technology in idaho classrooms , and i ’ m confident it will result in development of more educators like katie pemberton of canfield middle school in coeur d ’ alene .
let me tell you just how committed many of our idaho entrepreneurs are to seeing that milestone in the rearview mirror .
doug sayer of premier technology in blackfoot recently made a simple but profound change in the way he does business – shifting to idaho suppliers for a greater share of everything he buys for his company ’ s operations .
and he did it without sacrificing quality or profitability .
my thanks to them for advancing this proposal , and for working to see that its promise is realized .
it ’ s called the hire one act , which you approved at my request in 2011 .
but a number of companies already have told us that the terms and conditions of qualifying for that incentive are too complex and onerous to be the useful tool we ’ d hoped in economic development .
so i ’ m bringing you legislation this year to address those concerns and reflect our changing conditions and needs .
it simplifies , clarifies and streamlines the law so that our local and state economic development experts can maximize its potential for growing our workforce and our tax base .
and yes , we still await the release from taliban custody and pray for the homecoming of bowe bergdahl .
please join me in honoring the valor and sacrifice of these idaho war fighters , and in reaffirming our own commitment to protecting and defending the american and idaho way of life .
i am as committed as ever to enforcing the terms of our 1995 agreement with the federal government to get all nuclear waste out of idaho by 2035 .
but the yucca mountain facility in nevada may never open , leaving fulfillment of the agreement at the as you know , personal property tax receipts are a significant part of how some of our counties pay for public services .
whether the tax is eliminated all at once or phased out over a few years is less important to me than an exit strategy that considers our counties ’ financial stability .
at its core , this is a matter of state ’ s rights .
you all know how i feel about obamacare .
i will continue encouraging and supporting efforts by our idaho congressional delegation and many others to repeal and replace the law .
but the fact remains that for now and for the foreseeable future it is the law .
so i urge you to look beyond the important work of changing a misguided federal law to the essential task at hand for those of us in this chamber today – preserving for idaho citizens the option of having a voice in how one element of that law is implemented .
there is another population of idahoans for whom “ care ” is a matter of public safety .
we all saw just a few weeks ago the terrible impact on a community and a nation when mental illness leads to tragedy .
we are working proactively to avoid worst-case scenarios and to assert our rights as a state .
however , this past year we reaped the whirlwind sown by federal neglect and mismanagement of our public lands .

it ’ s the first update since 1996 , and it reflects use of the latest technology in better evaluating our needs and the status of our water supplies .
it goes to the very heart of the data-driven policymaking i ’ ve been promoting throughout my administration .
of course , our best chance for sustaining our idaho way of life is an engaged public .
what all of the people i ’ ve met at capital for a day have in common – and what they share with those of us in this chamber – are civic virtue and a deep commitment to retaining and building on what is great about idaho .
i ’ m confident that level of personal philanthropy continued and even grew in 2012 , and that we ’ ll keep paying it forward in 2013 and beyond – because volunteering and taking care of our own is in our dna .
it ’ s who we are .
it ’ s who you are , and i ’ m proud to join you in pressing ahead toward an ever-brighter and more hopeful future for us all .
thank you for your time and attention .
i wish you all the best in your work here , and may god continue to bless idaho and the united states of america. to us as we know of many vacancies in thailand .
we wish to place the beginning of our mission on the internet under the protection of st. francis xavier , whose feast day we celebratetoday ( dec .
3 ) and who died desiring to go to china .
heis thepatron of foreign missions and isvenerated in china and throughout asia .
this effectiveness -at a distance- adapts well to our brand of news service , while being far yet near to the heart of the church in chinaand her people .

a third of north dakota ’ s residents are of norwegian descent , the highest percentage of any state , and norway is one of the world ’ s top oil and gas producing countries .

" : this is the greeting from china , sent to asianews by a priest recently released from prison . very similar messages come in frommany parts of asia where the human person is humiliated and the church and religions persecuted .

michele brambillain una lettera p .
michele brambilla racconta le nuove iniziative lanciate a ottobre .
kodbir , un piccolo sottocentro , sarà eretto a parrocchia .
per tutto il mese , i giovani cattolici reciteranno il rosario , dedicandolo ogni settimana a un continente diverso.kodbir ( asianews ) - a ottobre , il " mese missionario per eccellenza " , la chiesa del bangladesh testimonia la sua vivacità e vitalità con istituto missioni estere ( pime ) a kodbir , un piccolo sotto centro del paese , le racconta ad asianews .
una nuova parrocchia , " punto di inizio perché chiamati a essere più uniti nel lavorare insieme per il regno di dio " ; la recita del rosario , che ogni settimana i giovani dedicano a un continente diverso , " pregando per loro e chiedendo il dono della pace del cuore " .
di seguito , la lettera bangladesh .
vi scrivo in un periodo in cui non si è soliti scrivere lettere annunciarvi che il giorno 16 novembre 2013 il sotto centro di kodbir sarà eretto a parrocchia con il nome di conversione di san paolo apostolo .
sarà un momento di grandissima gioia che la nostra comunità vivrà e a cui voi tutti siete invitati .
l 'erezione a parrocchia segna un punto di arrivo e uno di inizio per la nostra giovane comunità cristiana .
punto di arrivo perché dimostra la sua indipendenza dalla parrocchia madre di dhanjuri , indipendenza che non significa separazione , ma maturità in quanto pronti per camminare da soli come ci ha ricordato il nostro vescovo lo scorso mese in un incontro con tutti i catechisti e i capi villaggio .
punto di inizio perché siamo chiamati ad essere sempre più uniti nel lavorare insieme per il regno di dio e il bene comune. gioia per questo momento e spero che anche da lontano tutti voi possiate partecipare a questo evento attraverso il ricordo e la preghiera. collegato al primo .
in questi mesi di mia permanenza nel sotto centro , con l 'aiuto dei catechisti , delle suore e di volontari sono aumentate le attività a carattere religioso , sociale e sanitario .
ci siamo resi conto che un salone per gli incontri e delle stanze per il pernottamento con i relati servizi igienici sono necessari .
quindi con il contributo ricevuto dalla fondazione pime e da amici abbiamo iniziato la realizzazione della prima ala del centro di ottobre , mese missionario per eccellenza , ci vede impegnati come comunità nella recita settimanale del rosario missionario .
i giovani di kodbir hanno disegnato i cinque continenti su dei cartelloni .
ogni settimana ricordiamo le persone di un continente appendendo il disegno davanti all 'altare , pregando per loro e chiedendo il dono della pace del cuore , dal quale viene la vera pace .
vedi anche11 / 04 / 2013 bangladeshp .
speziale , il pime e la missione sulle rive del brahmaputra di nozrul islam07 / 10 / 2010 bangladeshla missione di padre speziale : trasformare le vite dei poveri emarginati di william gomes 19 / 10 / 2007 bangladesh - pimee ' morto p .
